cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB name to invalid format with special characters causes configuration validation failure and rejection.

du.explanation_en: Changing gNB_ID from string to number causes type mismatch, leading to JSON parsing errors or configuration rejection.
du.explanation_zh: 將 gNB_ID 從字串改為數字會導致類型不匹配，造成 JSON 解析錯誤或配置被拒絕。
